name: 3D World Selfie Museum
description: The 3D World Selfie Museum is one of Dubai’s newest attractions. This enormous 21,000 square foot facility, the first of its type in the area and the largest 3D Art Museum in the world, was specifically created for people seeking hassle-free entertainment away from popular tourist destinations. It is perfect for both adults and children because it features close to 200 3D art works spread over its nine zones. The enormous artworks displayed here each have a remarkable trompe l’oeil quality that stimulates your imagination to a whole nother height. The greatest feature is that you’ll get a close-up view of these enormous wonders as you engage with, touch, and obviously, experience them. It seems to provide you the opportunity to enter a mural, portrait, or painting that jumps off the walls or floors and, through your imaginative participation, further develop a scene or tale. As you explore these displays, you may find yourself in tiger-infested jungles or appearing to be swinging from an elephant’s trunk. There are strange experiences that let you engage with Egyptian mummies, pose for photos with a life-size bear, and explore the fascinating underwater environment. Bring your camera with you so that you can comeback with the most incredible and hilarious photos, as there will be plenty of opportunities for fun and hilarity waiting for you at every turn.

name: Al Montazah Waterpark
description:
Experience an exciting day at the acclaimed Al Montazah Parks! Here, two spectacular parks are waiting to enliven your day by providing the most exhilarating activities. At the aptly called Island of Tales, immerse yourself in a world of legends and myths while enjoying more than 25 rides. The story of the Pearl of Knowledge is the focus of the oasis-like Pearls Kingdom, which is right next door and features the best water slides ever. 

Be prepared for a Fun Mix of Adventure & Entertainment

Al Montazah Parks in Sharjah offer the utmost in water and enjoyment at one place. You will have access to Isle of Legends & Pearls Kingdom’s rides, slides, and other attractions with your selected Al Montazah admission pass. It is a world of thrilling adventures that your entire family or party will love, and it is situated on Flag Island.

Amazing Rides Will Take You Back 

As you visit Island of Legends, you’ll discover yourself in the middle of classical ideas from all over the world. Here, you will enter the interesting stories and legends that allow you to journey through nine different countries in time. Enjoy thrilling adventures at Volcano Tower, Dragon Discovery, and other attractions. Teacups, Happy Swing, and La Fiesta will also help you recall your childhood. Additionally, you can explore the entire park by riding the Time Train or rotating on the famous eye of Emirates wheel.

name: Aquaventure Waterpark
description:
A visit to Atlantis Aquaventure in the heart of the imposing Atlantis, The Palm Resort promises you experiences beyond any waterpark you’ve ever been to. From heart-racing slides to the lazy river and private beach relaxations, this premier water park in Dubai has everything to make your holiday both thrilling and memorable. This waterpark is bound to give you a unique experience.

 

Surpassing your Expectations

Atlantis Aquaventure is jam-packed to the gills with experiences and attractions perfect for thrill-seekers, marine enthusiasts, families, and young children alike. Daredevil rides and attractions like the Leap of Faith, Poseidon’s Revenge, and Master Blast water coasters are available for thrill seekers. Take a trip to Aquaconda, Zoomerango, and Slitherine, the first dual slide in the world, if you want to have the most thrilling water fun possible. Being an all-age facility, Splasher, which has some fun kid-only games, slides, and climbing structures, makes it perfect for your young children as well. Enjoy entry to the resort’s top attractions, including the 700-meter-long Adventure Beach and Surf’s Up, the ultimate wave rider attraction, in addition to unlimited access to its rides, slides, and Shark lagoon experiences.

 

Additionally, with the Super Pass for Atlantis Aquaventure, get unlimited access to Aquaventure Beach and Water Park, and also a chance to visit the infamous Lost Chamber Aquarium!

Make the most of its selection of exhilarating, calmer, and rides tailored to children by Access to the Lost Chambers Aquarium, where visitors can see more than 65,000 different marine animals and have the opportunity to watch marine experts feed sharks while diving

name: Helicopter Tour
description:
The 15-minute flight—Fly from Dubai’s most well-known artificial island to the tallest building on Earth. View Aquaventure Water Park, the striking Burj Al Arab, the coastline of Jumeirah Beach, and The World Islands from its south pole while traveling from Atlantis the Palm to Burj Khalifa.

The 22-minute ride includes stops at the Atlantis Hotel, Burj Al Arab Hotel, Burj Khalifa, Downtown Dubai, Madinat Jumeirah, The Palm Island, The Palm Jumeirah, and The World Islands.

The 12-minute ride takes in Sheikh Rashid Palace, the Burj Khalifa, Downtown Dubai, Rashid Creek, Zabeel Palace, and the Corniche.

Burj Khalifa, Ras al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary, Meydan Racetrack, JW Marriott Hotel, Emirates Towers 2, Dubai Mall, Burj Al Arab, Palm Jumeirah, and the Atlantis Hotel are all visible during the 40-minute ride.

Experience a dramatic ascent from a contemporary man-made marvel to the legendary creek where Dubai was founded during the 25-minute ride.

Take in the wonder of Dubai’s sprawling metropolis from above.

Fly over The World Islands and the Arabian Gulf from Atlantis the Palm to Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world. 

Enjoy the skyscrapers along Sheikh Zayed Road before gazing in awe at Dubai Creek’s alluring historic architecture. 

Before turning inland to view Dubai Internet City, Jebel Ali Race Course, Emirates Living neighborhoods, Jumeirah Lake Towers, and Dubai Marina, pass Port Rashid, Union House, and the Jumeirah Beach coastline on the way back.

name: Global Village
description:
Prepare to enjoy the region’s largest shopping and amusement attraction with your Global Village tickets! This massive open-air destination promises you endless fun, excitement, and adventure by showcasing the culture, cuisines, and other must-experiences of approximately 80 countries. From family and kid-friendly rides to live shows and concerts, this all-ages Dubai landmark never disappoints!

What to Expect?
Experience the Culture, Traditions, and Spirit of 80 Countries All in One Destination

 

Global Village brings together the finest of activities on offer through its massive stalls and pavilions representing over 80 diverse countries and cultures. With around 3500 outlets and close to 200 dining options, you can literally experience the magic of almost all continents and their various countries in a single day! The international cuisine, souvenirs, shopping, rides, all contribute to our guests’ fun experience.

Fantastic Live Shows and Grand Concerts will keep you entertained

 

Over 40,000 live performances, mostly by internationally recognized artists, will take place throughout the duration of Global Village. From lively stage shows and enlightening stage presentations to unrivaled energetic shows, the best thing about these performances is that they are free of charge! 

Discover Thrill and Fun for Every Individual taste 

For children and families, sections like Carnival are a true treat, and for those who enjoy heart-pounding adventure and fun, stunt shows with nerve-wracking acrobatic acts and daring stunts are the place to go. Aside from the rides and performances, there is also the first Ripley’s Believe It or Not museum in the area, which features some of the most peculiar and eccentric artifacts.

name: Dubai Safari Park
description: Near a 119-acre property in Al Warqa, Dubai Safari Park is ready to provide a real wildlife experience for anyone looking to spend the craziest day possible in the middle of the desert metropolis. This park, the first of its kind in the UAE, was designed with the primary objective of providing an extraordinarily safe and peaceful habitat for all of its residents, including animals that are rescued, through innovative conservation and rehabilitation activities. You may find more than 2400 residents in its four separate sections, including African and Asian Village, Arab and Open Safari Village. All of the animals were carefully collected from different zoos around the world. These sections will easily transport you to the beautiful landscapes of the savannah of Africa & Arabian steppes whilst enabling you to participate in many activities like falconry, camel rides, hunting dogs, etc. They also display a vast range of culture and environments. Don’t pass up the opportunity to ride elephants and feed giraffes, either. Unquestionably, the safari experience which is drive-through in a powerful and safe vehicle is the most exciting feature of this park. This will allow you to get quite close to the fearsome wolves, Bengal tigers, hippopotamuses, and other free-roaming animals at Open Safari Village. In addition, it features the largest elephant and lion drive-through exhibits in the UAE as well as the world’s first crocodile drive-through exhibit. There is also a theater with 1000 seats where you may watch fascinating raccoon and binturong performances. The park’s Wadi sector, which is home to a number of rare bird and animal species, offers a number of leisure and dining options, including a skiing area, kids’ play area, and adventure zone. The park’s main selling point is that it uses solar energy for the majority of its amenities, making it completely energy efficient. Its verdant landscape contains more than 100 different plant species, and it is renowned for its ingenious garbage disposal and water recycling systems, as well as air-conditioned rocks, misting machines, and specially chilled swimming pools that shield the locals from the sweltering summer heat. A trip to the Dubai Safari Park will unquestionably place you at the nexus of knowledge, adventure, and pulse-pounding thrill.

name: Jet Car Dubai
description:
On this thrilling Jet Car ride, take a dip into Dubai’s vibrant waters unlike anything you’ve ever done. This is a thrilling water adventure that is largely a first for the area. It features an action-packed water ride on board a stylish amphibious car, lasting anywhere from 20 to an hour. It guarantees you a highly safe and pleasurable automobile ride on water and is equipped with an amazing rear engine and a variety of cutting-edge yet user-friendly features.

Prepare Yourself for a Fun Water Activities

Jet Car offers the most memorable and exhilarating water adventure in Dubai, whether you want to take a break from the typical water park attractions or are just looking to participate in an alternative water activity. This amphibious vehicle is designed to look like a car, giving you the opportunity to enjoy the thrill of operating a modern car on Dubai’s waterways. You have the option of riding it alone or joining an experienced escort who will handle the move from beginning to end. It has seats for two people.

Unobstructed Views of the Changing City Skyline  

The Jet Car ride elevates your Dubai sightseeing experience above and beyond the fun and adrenaline factors. It will take you on a tour of the region’s glistening seas while presenting you with enthralling views of the many famous landmarks in the area. With no crowds or obstructions, you can enjoy a genuinely enchanted view of the stunning sights over Dubai Marina, Bluewater Island, Palm Jumeirah, Burj Al Arab, the Palm, etc.

name: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo
description:
There are a few world wonders that are beyond your wildest dreams. However, Dubai demonstrated that they were not only theoretically possible but also practically possible. The Dubai Aquarium, located in the Dubai Mall Aquarium, is one of these uncommon wonders of the world.

Don’t be misled by the name; this is not just any aquarium; it is the biggest suspended aquarium in the world, rising up to the third level of the Dubai Mall from the ground floor. The size of the Dubai aquarium captivates your attention and keeps you glued to your feet. It is home to around 33000 exotic marine life species.

Discover the world of aquatic creatures, which includes a 40-year-old 750 kg giant crocodile, piranha, pelagic fish, snakes, penguins, lizards, and many other amazing species. The 10-million-liter Dubai aquarium is a representation of the splendor, serenity, and depth of the underwater world.

You can also benefit from our 180-degree aquarium tunnel, underwater zoo, aquarium tunnel, behind-the-scenes tour, underwater observatory, and much more, depending on the package you select. Visit the Submersible Simulator, which takes guests on a made-up journey through the ocean’s wildlife, including dugongs, whale sharks, and other creatures. Take advantage of the Aquarium Glass Bottom Boat, where you can see thousands of animals swimming beneath you, and the Big Screen Theatre, which shows a movie about how the staff at the Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo effectively looks after more than 3,000 visitors each day. Regardless of what you decide, your trip to the Dubai Aquarium, tunnel and the underwater zoo will be stimulating, fascinating, and exciting in every way.

name: Dubai Marina Zip Line
description: With XLine Dubai Marina, soar into the air above the magnificent Dubai Marina! It not only enables you to take in the longest urban zipline in the world but also one of Dubai’s most opulent cityscapes. So come register with Al Salaam Tours and get ready to imagine yourself as a superhero (or supervillain, we don’t judge) during this thrilling adventure. This allows you the exceptional opportunity to enjoy the journey concurrently with your companion or spouse thanks to the two wires being set out side by side. Meet the knowledgeable staff before you launch yourself into the air. They will give you thorough safety instructions and assist you in getting fitted for your safety equipment and harness. As the ride begins, you’ll soar head-first, belly-down, over Dubai Marina’s breathtaking vistas. Take a look around and take in the most incredible aerial views of the buildings that make up Palm Jumeriah, Dubai Marina, and JBR Beach. During the voyage, you may also catch a sight of opulent yachts or even some brand-new attractions, such Ain Dubai. It has a 16 degree inclination and can reach speeds of up to 80 km/h, making it one of the quickest zipline experiences. The journey is one kilometer long. Due to the thorough work being done behind it by a highly qualified and accredited personnel, you can rest assured that it is under the highest level of security.

name: Hero Odysea
description:
Become a Captain for the day and drive your own HERO boat along the iconic coastline of Dubai! Reach speeds over 45km/h on these fun, agile, and fast HERO boats. This activity is a fun alternative to sightseeing in Dubai as you stop along the way at famous landmarks like Atlantis, the Palm, and Burj Al Arab. The HERO boats were designed with practicality and aesthetics in mind – but best of all, they are loads of fun! At HERO OdySea the safety and well-being of our guests and staff have always been the priority and as a responsible tourism company, industry-leading health and safety standards are at our core.

On a HERO boat, the only self-drive boat trips available in Dubai, you can discover what it’s like to captain your own vessel along the city’s famous shoreline. Enjoy a once-in-a-lifetime adventure as you captain your own boat on a thrilling cruise along Dubai’s coastline. A knowledgeable guide will accompany you on a special excursion that will allow you to appreciate and capture images of Dubai’s renowned beaches, the iconic Burj al Arab, beachside homes and palaces, the man-made marvel of The Palm Jumeirah, and the distinctive Atlantis Resort. As you pause to take pictures and the Tour Guides spill the beans, you may learn more about these Dubai landmarks.

description: This beautiful garden is said to be the biggest butterfly garden in the world. A butterfly museum and ten custom-built domes can be found in this circular garden. The climate-controlled domes give the butterflies a comfortable atmosphere and allow the domes to be open all year.

name: Ekart Zabeel Dubai
description: Visit Ekart Zabeel Dubai instead of the typical attractions in Dubai! At the first indoor kart venue in the nation, it promises you the greatest go-kart racing experience. It was built by Emaar Entertainment and is situated in the Zabeel Extension of the Dubai Mall, which is not only the biggest mall in the world but also the location of some of the most popular tourist destinations in the area, including KidZania, VR Park, the Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo, and the Dubai Ice Rink. There are 11 elevated, electric go karts in the roomy indoor area, all of which are zero-emission and environmentally sustainable. It accommodates all levels of competence, whether you’re an experienced racer eager to experience the fastest acceleration ever or a newbie looking to test your racing prowess. You don’t even need to be an expertise to try them; beginners and first-timers can benefit greatly from this vast track. The only requirements are that you are at least 14 years old, 140 centimeters tall, and no heavier than 120 pounds. A thorough safety briefing will be provided to you right away because Ekart racing places a high priority on both safety and track upkeep. All protective equipment, such as a racing suit and helmet, will be given to you. Put on your gear, sit in the driver’s seat of the kart, and drive away! As you navigate the turns and race against the clock or your fellow competitors, pick up your speed levels and zoom over the track lanes. The fact that your kart records your performance makes it much more thrilling. This keeps track of your lap timings and lets you post them online as well.

name: Dune Buggy Adventure
description:
This begins with an optional pick-up from your hotel or other preferred Dubai location and then transports you, around 30 to 40 minutes outside the city center, deep into the gorgeous Dubai desert. Although this is a fast-paced excursion, driving a buggy through the sand dunes does not require any advanced abilities. So, after receiving a thorough safety briefing from your knowledgeable and pleasant staff, you’re all set to embark on your buggy tour across the desert sands of Dubai. Just put on your safety goggles and helmet to get started safely.

For anyone searching for an adrenaline-fueled trip across the unmatched Arabian Desert, our Dune Buggy Ride Dubai session is ideal. Yes, it allows you the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to zoom around the dunes of the area while riding in a meticulously kept, high-performance buggy.

You can anticipate an exhilaratingly entertaining rough journey when the true Dune Buggy Ride Dubai experience begins. Increase the speed at which it whisks you through the endless sands! This promises you a tremendously thrilling trip as it takes you over the difficult desert terrains with sharp turns and enormous dunes. However, this is more than just an adventurous experience because it gives you a unique, unparalleled vantage point from which to take in the bizarre desert beauty and surroundings.

Choose the Correct Dune Buggy

You can choose from the Dune Buggy 800 CC (two/four-seater) and Dune Buggy 1000 CC (two/four-seater). Depending on the package you choose, your dune buggy experience lasts between 30 and 60 minutes.

name: Hot Air Balloon
description: The Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve is one of the most popular locations for hot air balloon rides because of the surreal surroundings. Let us handle the planning if you want this once-in-a-lifetime experience to be handled by a professional. We guarantee that you’ll enjoy this breathtaking activity to the fullest without any worry, from arranging transfers (optional) to making sure there is free Wi-Fi on that aircraft. The hot air balloon trip begins with a before dawn pick up because it is an early-morning excursion. As you approach the launch location in Skydive Desert Margham, be aware of how the enormous balloon is filled and prepared for the flight. After warming up with the complimentary refreshments, pay attention to the safety instructions before boarding the vibrant balloon, with a basket that can accommodate up to 20 passengers. As soon as the balloon lifts up, you’ll be entranced! For roughly 40 to 70 minutes, the wind will calmly carry you over the breathtaking conservation area and above the desert’s vegetation and fauna. Look down at the camels and gazelles ambling around in the desert freely from a height of more than 1000 feet. Take in the beautiful views of the sun rising over from the Hajjar Mountains and setting admist the sand dunes that are colored orange and crimson. These astoundingly cool and serene sights stand in stark contrast to Dubai’s busy attractions, which are only 30 kilometers away. You will also discover some fascinating details about the wildlife and ecosystem of the desert from your knowledgeable and kind pilot. You will be gently and safely brought to the ground after the flight. Enjoy a 5-star breakfast package as well as a flight certificate that has been signed by the pilot and a group photo to commemorate the event.

name: Dubai Autodrome
description:
Would you like to take a break from touring and experience the rush of adrenaline? Go-karting at Dubai Kartdrome will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the world of speed. The primary motorsports venue in the city, Dubai Autodrome, which is located in Motor City, includes Dubai Kartdrome. Dubai Kartdrome elevates go-karting to a new level of adventure, difficulty, and enjoyment. 

Take Advantage of the Outdoor & Indoor Circuit Access

Both an indoor and outdoor circuit are available at Dubai Kartdrome. The 1.2 km long outdoor circuit has 17 bends, a tunnel and a bridge. The accessible karts have powerful engines that satiate your urge for speed while also providing complete comfort and safety. The location also features a track for racing at night. In addition to this, this facility offers kids the chance to try out games like Race Room and Laser Tag.

Get Help from the Pros & Prepare for the Ride

You will be given safety instructions by the facility’s staff as you arrive at Dubai Kartdrome. To make sure that you ride safely, it’s crucial to pay close attention to the directions. The safety gear required for go-karting will then be fitted to you. Enjoy either indoor or outdoor go-karting to the fullest.

Suitable for All Karting Levels 

With its indoor circuit made for novice and young drivers, Dubai Kartdrome is ideal for both children and adults. Make sure you abide by the age restrictions. In contrast to the outside circuit, which is open to individuals over 13, the indoor circuit allows children under the age of seven to enjoy go-karting.

name: The Lost Chambers Aquarium
description: Visit the Lost Chamber Aquarium to see one of the most extraordinary and unique aquariums in the Middle East. The aquarium, a mesmerizing feature of Atlantis, The Palm Resort, offers more than meets the eye. It also stands out due to the fantastic settings that give the Lost City of Atlantis legend life. When you enter the aquarium, the network of intricate rooms and tunnels that surround you will absolutely astound you. As you explore the more than 20 different marine exhibits on show here, behold the breathtaking beauty of the undersea world. Visit albino alligators, uncommon kinds of eels, rays, sharks, jellyfish, sharks, piranhas, seahorses, and Arapaima, the largest freshwater fish. Visit the Touch Tank to feel aquatic specialties like starfish. Additionally, make use of the interactive touch displays put here to learn more about these vivacious aquatic creatures. While exploring its various areas, you can take in the ancient artifacts that provide fascinating insights into the mysterious Atlantean culture and history. As part of your aquarium visit, you can also partake in a variety of incredible activities, such as watching the vibrant aquatic life in the Ambassador Lagoon or going on an optional behind-the-scenes tour to learn more about the aquarium’s fascinating daily operations. You can also go on an exciting Fish Tale Tour with an expert aquarist to see sights like the cutting-edge fish hospital. Consider purchasing a simple ticket upgrade that gives you entrance to the heart-pounding rides, slides, and aquatic activities within the massive Atlantis resort if you want to add extra adventure, fun, and pizzazz to your trip there.

name: Infinity Des Lumières
description:
The dynamic art space Infinity Des Lumières is the first of its kind in the Arabian Peninsula. The second level of the Dubai Mall’s 2,700 square meters is filled with the most immersive art viewing experience possible, enhanced by cutting-edge light, sound, and movement techniques. More than 130 projectors, 58 speakers, and 3,000 high-definition moving images combine to make this possible. Add to that the largest digital façade in the mall at 200 square meters.

Infinity Des Lumières is definitely not your typical art gallery! The most cutting-edge audio and visualization methods are at the heart of the theme in this amazing art space. This makes it more than just a place to view the finest and most brilliant artworks; rather, it promises you a multisensory experience by allowing you to physically interact with each exhibit on display.

The exhibition featuring works by Vincent Van Gogh is the main attraction. This enables you to view some of his well-known works in their digital format, including Potato Eaters, Sunflowers, and others. With the animations of lanterns, seascapes, and samurai warriors in the second exhibition, Dreamed Japan, you can enter a fantastical world while learning about Japan in the 19th century. Verse, the third exhibition, transports you to the cosmos and infinity with the help of Thomas Vanz’s breathtaking creations.

name: Sky View Observatory
description:
Sky Views from Emaar, which is perched atop the Address Sky View Hotel, combines three thrilling activities—Sky Edge Walk, the Sky Slide and the Observatory—into one. The Observatory, which offers the most mesmerizing views of Dubai, is included in your standard Sky View Dubai ticket, as is access to the Sky Slide, which whisks you down from the 53rd to the 52nd level through a completely transparent glass tube while ensuring the most fantastical views of the surroundings.

Obtain Epic Panoramic Views of Dubai

Prepare to view Dubai’s urban landscape from a fresh vantage point as you ride a glass elevator to the Address Sky View Hotel’s 52nd floor. Wander about before ascending the spiral stairway to the 53rd floor, where you’ll be pampered with

Take Instagram-worthy pictures

A 25-meter-long glass walkway connecting the towers of this twin hotel, which is located at a height of 219.5 meters, is the main attraction of the Observatory’s two levels. It offers a fantastic vantage point from which to take in the magnificent cityscapes as well as an excellent location for taking photos that are ideal for Instagram.

Take a Ride on the First-of-a-Kind Glass Sky Slide

As you ride the incredibly thrilling Glass Sky Slide attraction from the 53rd level to the 52nd level, you will experience the joy and rush of a lifetime. Yes, you shouldn’t anticipate it to be a typical park slide. The first of its type in the entire Middle East, this breath-taking slide adventure is located at Sky Views Dubai.

Enjoy Maximum Safety

The Sky Slide is absolutely transparent while being incredibly strong because it is made entirely of quadruple-laminated glass. With a floor-to-floor ride experience that is safe and unhindered, you can explore Dubai like never before. In addition, Edge Stroll lets you take the highest, first circular hands-free ledge walk in the area while testing your nerve (for extra charge.)

name: Play DXB
description:
Prepare to enter the wonderful gaming world with a seamless admission to Play DXB Dubai! Play DXB Dubai is one of the largest collections of Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality based attractions in the UAE, spanning over two levels of Dubai Mall, the largest shopping center in the world. With a focus on “Shared Escapism” and designed to defy realism, it crams roughly 18 interactive rides into its 7,000 square meter space.
Experience a True Drop

Burj Drop, located in the heart of Play DXB, gives you a unique chance to witness the Burj Khalifa, the tallest structure in the world. Imagine you are cleaning the glass of the enormous building when suddenly something goes wrong. Yes, with the help of the most cutting-edge VR headsets and immersive technology, you’ll be able to experience the fear and actual drop that sends you to the building’s outer edge.

Experience the Classic Dubai Experiences with a Twist.

You will be able to enjoy a variety of rides that are themed around well-liked Dubai attractions and activities, like VR Balloon and Dune Bash. Dubai Drone, which takes you directly to 2050, is a must-do for everyone who wants to take to the skies over Dubai in the future. Plummet is another another not-to-be-missed activity at Play DXB Dubai, especially for thrill seekers. It enables an exhilarating skydiving experience, but one without jumping from an airplane.

Live Your Favorite Scenes on Rides Inspired by Movies

You can enter attractions like The Walking Dead, John Wick Chronicles, and The Mummy Outbreak to get a unique perspective on your favorite films and television shows. Additionally, enjoy some of its outstanding games, such as The Raft, which guarantees the best multiplayer VR experience. Don’t worry if your children join you now; just play DXB. Throughout your stay in Dubai, there are a number of spectacular attractions to keep children occupied and energized.

name: Qasr Al Watan Abu Dhabi
description: Find your way to the remarkable Qasr Al Watan or the Palace of the Nation to escape Abu Dhabi’s typical attractions. The important government buildings are in Qasr Al Watan, a prominent area of the Presidential Palace complex in the capital city. In addition to being the location of the nation’s highest constitutional body, it also acts as a location to welcome visiting world leaders while they are in the UAE. Come follow in the royals’ footsteps while learning more about Emirati culture, tradition, and architectural splendor now that it is available to the public. As you enter the building and stand beneath the largest central dome in the nation, you will be able to appreciate some of the best examples of Royal Arabian architecture. Watch movies showcasing the fascinating features of the palace’s architecture as you navigate its many, attention-to-detail-enriched parts. Discover the Room of Gifts with the finest products on exhibit, go to the House of Knowledge, take in the magnificence of the Presidential Banquet area, and more. Admire the enormous chandeliers with more than 300,000 crystal pieces. Try crafting interesting calligraphy on interactive screens and spectacular, an evening light and sound show that not only transports you back in time but also takes you through the present and into the future. There are numerous attractions that provide immersive experiences. The Qasr Al Watan library also merits special note because it houses a wide variety of genuine publications on the region’s culture, history, archaeology, and constitution. You can also stroll across the palace’s verdant surroundings. The best views of the palace may be found on its lawn, where you can stroll beneath the tastefully serene arches.

This offers you the best sense of floating through the air since you are completely rooted into the mountain.

name: Museum of illusions
description:
Take a trip to the Museum of illusions Dubai for a unique entertainment experience with a dash of magic, intrigue, and adventure. In addition to providing a respite from Dubai’s flashy attractions, this charming area in Al Seef also allows you to visit the largest Museum of illusions in the world. Prepare yourself for an incredibly educational and graphic experience as you delve farther into this domain of utter confusion. 

The museum’s 80+ cutting-edge and unexplored displays will keep you wondering from the first moment you step in. Its numerous interactive attractions, which range from perplexing optical illusions and instructional chambers to difficult puzzles and captivating wooden games, will leave you breathless and inspire you to reevaluate your views on reality and science. After all, your brain might not be able to understand what your eyes are seeing here.

Dare to explore the Vortex Tunnel if you’re feeling daring. It will offer you the impression that you are travelling through a whirling tunnel despite its firm, steady base, making it nearly impossible to maintain your forward momentum. In addition to these, don’t miss its thrilling Anti-Gravity Room, Chair illusions, Anti-Gravity Room, Kaleidoscope, Einstein’s Hollow Face, etc

name: Big Bus Tours Dubai
description: The Big Bus Tour is a well-known tourist activity that allows you to explore Dubai’s unrivaled cultural and contemporary architectural wonders while relaxing on the two decks of an open-air Big Bus. The tour’s main selling point is that you can hop on and off as many times as you like for the period of your ticket, covering the entire length and breadth of the city. To get the best panoramic view of the most famous city on the Arabian Peninsula, choose between the 24-hour Classic Pass and the 48-hour Premium Pass! A modern double-decker bus will transport you while you enjoy the sights of Dubai from its sheltered lower level or its exhilarating open-air section, which provides breathtaking 360-degree views of the city’s wonders. Anyone wishing to design a flawless DIY Dubai itinerary should take this trip. It allows you to explore an area or attraction in-depth while you’re on the bus, get off at the various stops on the itinerary, with the utmost flexibility and freedom guaranteed, and get back on once you’re finished with your walking tour of Dubai’s vibrant neighborhoods, shopping, dining, or sightseeing in Dubai. This tour covers a total of 20 stops. You may explore a variety of the city’s most notable and traditional landmarks, from Downtown Dubai and City Walk to Heritage Village and the invariably attractive Emirati souks. The amazing Dubai Marina, Jumeirah, and Palm Jumeirah regions are also visited, with a particular focus on the Marina Promenade, Atlantis, The Palm, Jumeirah Beach, and Burj Al Arab.   You may get the most out of the tour by listening to the educational commentary, which is available in 12 languages including Arabic, English, Mandarin Chinese, Brazilian Hindi, Japanese, German, Italian, French, Portuguese, Spanish, and Russian. The Big Bus ticket includes three routes the City Tour, Beach Tour and the Marina Tour. Big bus time table : https://d1i3enf1i5tb1f.cloudfront.net/assets/img/bigbus-timetable.png

name: Kidzania Dubai Mall
description: Everyone wants their kids to have rational thinking skills, right? But how can we instruct them in that? Visit Kidzania, an interactive kid-sized city where they can be independent, reason logically, and hone their analytical skills without you having to do any effort. It may be difficult to imagine, but all it takes to experience it is a trip to Kidzania with Al Salaam tours. The entire town of Kidzania encourages education via play with the goal of sharpening kids’ social skills while having the most fun possible. At Kidzania, your child can participate in more than 100 role plays, including those of a police officer, dentist, and restaurant owner. Your child may learn the importance of money, transactions, and dealing by using the Kidzania city’s own currency to pay for goods and services. Everything a youngster needs in the city may be found there, including banks, ATMs, hospitals, supermarkets, theaters, pizzerias, and more. The best thing is that every activity has been planned with children’s height, minds, and expectations in mind. Skip the TV, the common slides, and the parks; instead, take your kids to Kidzania so they can learn about the real world in their own innocent way. You’ll keep returning here, we guarantee it, since your kids will enjoy and love it.

name: Evening Desert Safari Dubai
description:
This comprehensive Evening Desert Safari Dubai includes many activities and experiences that deepen your understanding of the native Bedouin culture and traditions in addition to the exhilarating 4X4 dune bash.

Exceeding Expectations

Explore Dubai from a Different Perspective

One of our most affordable desert packages is our Evening Desert Safari, which combines adventure, cultural entertainment, and a tasty dinner under the stars. This makes it ideal for anyone who wants to escape the glittering area of the city and further appreciate the pristine desert landscape that surrounds it.

Experience a once-in-a-lifetime journey

A thrilling, heart-pounding 4×4 drive that reveals the ethereal beauty and tranquillity of the desert sands is the real highlight of our Evening Desert Safari. Yes, you are able to travel the length of the golden dunes by diving low into the wide ditches and rising high atop the dunes. The mind-blowing desert sunset views, which make for an exceptional photographic experience, are a safari highlight not to be missed.

Discover the Real Bedouin Culture and Heritage 

After the dune bash, you’ll visit our authentic Arabic Bedouin campsite to get a glimpse of the desert’s true beauty. Enjoy authentic Arabic coffee, unwind in a tent that has been decorated in this beautiful manner, and puff on flavour-infused Shisha. Additionally, you will have the chance to ride a camel, traverse desert sands, dress in traditional Arabic garb for souvenir photos, adorn your hands with mind-blowing henna designs, and take pictures with a falcon perched on your shoulder.

Savour delectable barbecue while being entertained by spellbinding traditional performances

This exclusive safari also includes a delectable dinner with an international buffet and a selection of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes to tempt your taste buds. You can also take in the stunning Tanoura show and the  mesmerizing belly dance performances.

name: Scuba Diving Dubai
description:
During your trip to Dubai, explore the magnificent aquatic environment in the area! Join us on an incredible scuba diving adventure that guarantees you’ll have a blast. For both experienced divers and those who want to start scuba diving in Dubai, Rayna Tours offers customized diving packages.

Our scuba diving tour reveals you to the enigmatic undersea appeal unlike any other because it is a PADI recognized program that also includes expert help and safety guidelines. Our travel specialists will make sure that your scuba diving interest is adequately covered, offering everything from shore-based diving tours and beach scuba diving to combo packages ideal for both individuals and groups.

Your trained dive instructor will give you an educational orientation before the event actually starts. To fully prepare you for this underwater journey, there is a PADI video lesson available. Since this is the best approach to learning, the techniques and procedures required for scuba diving, it is especially helpful for novices.

You will put on your specialist dive gear and travel to the diving location once you have familiarized yourself with the principles of this great activity. You will safely dive into the ocean’s depths with the assistance of your certified instructor. This transports you to a whole different environment and exposes you to an amazing range of marine life that happily coexists in the area. On the conclusion of this activity successfully, you will receive a PADI certificate.

 

We also include tours with complicated itineraries in our specialty dive packages, mostly to appeal to extreme adventurers and fans of underwater photography. You only need to choose one of the scuba diving packages if you’re ready to dive into the Arabian Gulf’s sparkling waters and discover its diverse biosphere.

name: Louvre Abu Dhabi
description: The governments of Abu Dhabi and France worked together to create the first universal museum of its sort in the Arabian Peninsula. Obviously, the museum’s iconic name says it all. Contrary to its name, however, it is not solely focused on copying the design or content of the Louvre Museum, but rather on developing a logical path of exploration, openness, and unity. Through its vast exhibitions, this innovative and illuminating method provides visitors with the opportunity to discover a wide range of civilizations and periods of world history, compare and thoroughly study them, and most importantly, reflect on their true values. The $650 million museum features permanent installations that cover more than 65,000 square feet and are primarily supported by loans from renowned institutions like the Musée du Louvre, Musée d’Orsay, and Centre Pompidou. It exhibits a wide range of items that represent both ancient and the most recent in contemporary artistic expressions. It will take you through four different eras, from archeology and the beginning of Islam through the classical age and the current era, with its displays organized chronologically. Along with a portion specifically for children, there is also about 20000 square feet of area for transient exhibitions. Most importantly, the Louvre Abu Dhabi Universal Museum provides a spectacular sight from the water. It is a crucial part of the developing Saadiyat Cultural District, which will also house museums like the Zayed National Museum and the Guggenheim Museum. It consists of a number of gorgeous white buildings that resemble an Arabian metropolis. The awe-inspiring design was inspired by the region’s ancient building methods, such as the traditional Falaj water system and interwoven palm leaves that were originally used for roofing. This design is the work of award-winning French architect Jean Nouvel. The elaborate and multi-layered geometric lace dome of this captivating structure, which is complemented by millions of star-like cladding patterns, is probably its most distinctive feature. Elegant perforations in the resulting structure give a beautiful contrast between sunlight and shadow. Without a doubt, the one-of-a-kind museum is impressive in every way—unique concept, diverse offerings, and aesthetically pleasing design!

name: Al Ain City Tours
description:
On this excursion from Dubai, take in a revitalizingly different aspect of the UAE. Visit the beautiful city of Al Ain in the United Arab Emirates, which is home to museums, forts, parks, and primarily Jebel Hafeet, the second-largest mountain in the country.
Your Tour includes visits to such outstanding Al Ain attractions as Jebel Hafeet, the country’s tallest mountain; offering commanding views of the city. Al Jahili Fort, which houses the largest museum with intriguing exhibits including a rare arsenal of portraits of the ruling family portraits, and the renowned Camel Market, an authentic bustling Emirati souk where you can get close glimpses of various camel species.

 

Explore the captivating displays at the earliest museum of its kind in Al Ain and the Archeological Park, located at a Bronze Age site, to learn more about the ancient Emirati history and the cultural characteristics of the area. Additionally, enjoy a relaxing trip past the captivating historical buildings and a quick stop at some of the city’s most well-known attractions, like the Al Ain Zoo and Mall.

 

You can also visit the natural hot springs found at the foot of Jebel Hafeet Mountain promises to be a delightfully pleasant experience. So don’t wait to get in touch with us if you want to leave the glitzy sounds and views of Dubai and enter a different world. The availability of this excursion and the time of the group departure will determine whether or not an individual can reserve it. For an additional fee, we may organize pick-up from other emirates based on your request.

name: Laguna Waterpark
description: You’re in for a whole new parade of water-based fun and excitement at Laguna Water Park’s four interesting and varied zones! This fascinating area of La Mer, one of the most premium beachside projects on the Jumeirah, is home to the newest water park in Dubai, which is themed after the lively city of La Boca in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Your Laguna ticket grants you access to the best surfing in the area as well as a variety of slides and attractions suitable for riders of all ages and skill levels. The center of attention is the Surfing portion, which is home to the park’s main draw, the WaveOz 180 FloRider or Ultimate Surf Machine. As you enter this enormous water chamber that generates waves, you may anticipate a 180 degree surfing experience that is appropriate for both novices and seasoned surfers. The fact that this is one of only three of its sort in the entire globe is its most distinctive feature. Laguna’s Slide zone is a must-see for thrill lovers and includes such exhilaratingly curving attractions as Constrictor, Freefall, Loop, Mad Racer, and Mantra. Splash Zone with Aqua Play and Splash Pad is the next option. While Splash Pad is designed for toddlers as well as younger children up to the age of four, Aqua Play is a private children’s area (recommended for 4 to 12 years) with a large soaker bucket. After the excitement and enjoyment, do you want to relax? In addition to a magnificent Infinity Edge Pool and a Lazy River, Laguna Waterpark Dubai features an exclusive Relax zone with cabanas and direct beach access. The park is also filled with a variety of places to eat and shop.

name: The Green Planet
description: A true sanctuary in the desert, Green Planet recreates the incredible environment of the South American Amazon jungle. More than 3000 diverse species of plants and animals live in this vast glass biodome at City Walk, including crocodile lizards, snakes, and toco toucans with orange beeks. It covers an area of around 60,000 square feet. It features an attractive cylinder form with a surface that resembles an origami paper fold. It was created by Meraas and is run by ZoOceanarium Group. A visit to Green Planet is said to give you the impression that you are exploring an actual tropical forest because it has been meticulously designed with characteristics that look just like those found in a rainforest. The main attraction is a gigantic artificial Kapok tree that towers over the entire complex at a height of 25 meters. It is the biggest of its kind in the world and is made of vines and figs. It serves as a life-supporting tree for numerous rare plant, animal, and bird species. Along with adding to the appeal, a sparkling waterfall linked to the tree cools the air with mist. Thanks to its four levels, including Forest Floor, Flooded Rainforest, the Canopy, and the Midstory, this tree, which occupies the middle of the biodome, has covered every aspect of an ecosystem. In fact, you may expect amazing discoveries at every turn, including the Australian Walkabout, the Bat Cave, the Sloth Encounter, the Sugar Glider Encounter, and the Reptile Encounter. Additionally, you’ll get the chance to hold and handle a live python. Using the spiral staircase built around the tree or boarding an elevator will make it easier for you to explore these floors. Don’t pass up the opportunity to cross a rope suspension bridge, which will take you to a tree house and provide you with the only up-close views of the artificial tree, if you’re an adventurer. A visit to Green Planet is a must-do while in Dubai if you want to enjoy lush greenery and a cool ambiance in the middle of a hot desert metropolis, especially if you’re a nature enthusiast or traveling with your family and children.

name: Sharjah Cultural Journey
description:
Sharjah is regarded as the cultural center of the United Arab Emirates and is renowned for its abundance of preserved historical sites. Sharjah, which is only 30 minutes from Dubai’s glitzy attractions, offers a refreshing glimpse into the nation’s small-town charm and traditions. You’ll be happy to learn that UNESCO designated the area as the Arab Capital of Culture in 1998. Don’t miss our in-depth tour of Sharjah, which provides an opportunity to see some of the area’s most revered cultural treasures.

Be prepared to explore some of Sharjah’s historic souks, breathtaking heritage sites, and insightful museums as you cross the border from Dubai. Pass by the lovely Sharjah Corniche and pause at the expansive King Faisal Mosque, the largest structure of its kind in the emirate. The Sharjah Museum of Islamic Civilization offers seven distinctive galleries that provide an authentic look at virtually every aspect of Islamic art, culture, religion, and more. 

Visit Souk Al Markazi to learn more about Sharjah’s main shopping destination. You can choose some incredibly unique jewelry pieces, handicrafts, carpets, and other items at this market, also known as Blue Souk.

Continue on to the perpetually bubbling Qanat Al Qasba, which has a kilometer-long canal and attractions like a huge Ferris wheel (Eye of the Emirates). Before your unforgettable cultural getaway comes to an end with a return transfer to your Dubai location, check out the bustling Fish Market and enjoy a drive through Sharjah Cultural Square with a breathtaking sculpture of the Holy Quran.

Witness the Al Noor Mosque – a masterpiece influenced by traditional Turkish Ottoman architecture which is one of the city’s most recognizable and historically significant buildings. Take a tour of this congested but historically sensitive city and enrich yourself with its historical benefits.,A cordial welcome with Arabic coffee and dates is followed by a warm discussion about religion and culture. Finally, a trip to the Sharjah Fort and Sharjah Museum of Islamic Civilization brings this historical journey into the center of this Arab Cultural Capital to a satisfying conclusion.

name: Dinner in the sky
description:
You have the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to dine on a huge rotating platform that is hung 50 meters in the air during Dinner in the Sky. With your company of up to 22 people, you may dine in a very private and secure environment while also enjoying the most breathtaking 360-degree views of the city’s iconic landmarks, including the Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, and others. Overall, it guarantees you an eating and sightseeing experience you’ll never forget.

Get in the Air

After arriving at its location in Skydive Dubai (Al Sufouh), buckle up before a crane gently hoists you to a height of roughly 50 meters. Look around for the best, unobstructed views of the city skyline as you lean back in your comfortable chair with your feet hanging in the air. During this wonderful 90-minute eating experience, the table and the chairs gently rotate, allowing you to take in all the iconic places of Dubai like never before.

Enjoy a Dining Experience Unlike Any Other

This aerial location can accommodate up to 22 guests at once and offers a three-course feast or a savory or sweet dessert (depending on whether you select lunch, supper, or an afternoon tea) Both non-vegetarian and veg delicacies are offered on the menu, and each is made live in front of you. It is not surprising that Forbes included Dinner in the Sky on its list of the top 10 most unusual restaurants in the world because it offers a combination of delicious food and breathtaking vistas.Dine & Capture Treasured Moments with Absolute Safety. 

You may be guaranteed of its top-notch safety whether you select this location for your first date, to mark a significant event, or simply to treat your particular group to an unusual eating session. This Belgian-born eating concept adheres to the stringent regulations of the UAE’s Department of Occupational Safety & Health and Civil Defense and was created in accordance with the German standard DIN 4112. All of these ensure that your entire airborne experience will be enjoyable and quite safe.

name: Motiongate Dubai
description:
Enjoy Hollywood fever at Motiongate Dubai, one of the biggest theme parks in Dubai. It is a component of the bigger Bollywood Parks & Resorts, which also includes three additional theme parks and a five-star hotel. Motiongate Dubai provides all the ingredients needed to make your journey memorable, dramatic, and exciting. To take advantage of some fantastic offers and discounts, you may purchase your Motiongate Dubai tickets with Al SalaamTours.

Expectations for Motiongate Dubai

Three of Hollywood’s largest motion picture studios, Columbia Pictures, DreamWorks Animation, and Lionsgate, are honored on Motiongate. There are five zones in the park, and each one includes spectacular rides and activities.

The Golden Age of Hollywood is represented by Studio Central. You can visit actual movie sets, discover the magic of filming, take part in theatrical openings, and tour a movie studio’s executive offices.

Expectations for Motiongate Dubai

Dedicated to Columbia Pictures, Motiongate There are seven interactive rides and attractions at Columbia Pictures that are based on the motion pictures made there. Transylvania Hotel, The attractions in this area include the water ride Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs – River Expedition, Flint’s Imagination Lab, Zombieland Blast-Off, Ghostbusters: Battle of New York, The Green Hornet: High Speed Chase, and Underworld 4D.

Lionsgate:

Visit Lionsgate to explore the captivating world of the Hunger Games film. The most thrilling attractions in this area are Capitol Bullet Train and Panem Aerial Tour. Along with exhilarating rides, there is live entertainment, shopping, and a wide range of culinary options available here. Don’t miss Step Up Dubai, All, an incredible dancing show.

DreamWorks is an indoor attraction that features four distinct zones that each represent a major DreamWorks Animation film. With its twelve interactive play areas, funhouses, and rollercoasters, Madagascar, Shrek, Kung Fu Panda, and How to Train Your Dragon allow you to discover the intriguing worlds of these films. Smurfs Village: Who can resist the endearing blue humanoids from the hit film Smurfs? The Smurfs Hamlet is where you may meet the amiable Smurfs and tour their village and mushroom-shaped homes. Smurfs Studio Tours, Smurfs Village Playhouse, Smurfberry Factory, Smurf Village Express, and Woodland Play Park are just a few of the zone’s five captivating activities.

name: Explore Abu Dhabi
description: With our Abu Dhabi city tour, you can learn more about the UAE’s capital city and its amazing historical, cultural, and exciting sights. You can explore Abu Dhabi’s various facets and persona thanks to transfers that have been scheduled to and from Dubai. Learn how the capital city of the United Arab Emirates miraculously combines its rich ancient heritage with the most cutting-edge contemporary life on an Abu Dhabi city tour with Al Salaam Tours. To make sure you don’t miss out on seeing Abu Dhabi’s important sights, we’ve carefully chosen the highlights for this tour package. Therefore, as we pick you up from your hotel or other preferred location in Dubai for a two-hour drive to Abu Dhabi, get ready to see some of the most impressive landmarks in the UAE. The stunning and enormous Sheik Zayed Grand Mosque, which bears the name of the late president, His Highness Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, is one sight that will undoubtedly catch your eye as you travel to Abu Dhabi’s city center. name: Dubai City Tour
description: On this in-depth tour of Dubai, learn about the city’s history, culture, and unparalleled modern side. This gives you the chance to see the area’s assortment of historic, renowned, and iconic landmarks with roundtrip hotel transfers. One of the best ways to discover Dubai, often referred to as the jewel of the Middle East, is to take Al Salaam Tours’ four-hour Dubai city tour package. The tour includes a stop at the Dubai Museum, which is located inside the Al Fahidi Fort from the 18th century. It features artwork and artifacts that depict the traditional Arab way of life and ancient history. Another well-liked attraction featured in this book is Jumeirah Mosque, which is a perfect example of how outstanding Islamic and modern architecture can coexist. Our itinerary also includes a visit to incredible Dubai attractions like the Burj Al Arab Hotel, the only seven-star hotel in the world known for its distinctive silhouette that resembles a billowing sail, the Palm Island, a crescent-shaped man-made island, the Atlantis Hotel, and the Burj Khalifa, the tallest structure of its kind in the entire world. The city’s scenic attractions are also noteworthy, and a photo stop at the immaculate Jumeirah Beach will give you a special chance to take in the natural beauty of the area. The journey comes to an end with a drive down Sheik Zayed Road, which is flanked on either side by massive skyscrapers, and some shopping at one of the city’s well-known malls. Our tour ensures to meet all your specific needs, whether you’re a history enthusiast, a shopaholic, or just visiting to catch a glimpse of the city’s major tourist attractions.

name: Overnight Safari Dubai
description:
Here’s your chance to set up camp in Dubai under the starry desert skies! Just take our overnight desert safari, which includes camping amenities amid remote sands, food, and traditional entertainment.

The Overnight Desert Safari Dubai offered by Al Salaam Tours is a wonderful opportunity to take in the sights, sounds, and stars of an Arabian Desert night. This exceptional desert excursion ensures that your time in Dubai will be deeply illuminating and rejuvenating. It offers the ideal blend of Emirati culture, nature, and adventure.

Prepare for an unforgettable overnight stay in our desert camp, which is furnished with sleeping bags, blankets, and other conveniences, following an incredible belly dancing performance. The primary highlight of your trip to Dubai will undoubtedly be spending the night in a cozy Bedouin tent under the beautiful Arabian sky. Before leaving the solitude of the Arabian Desert in the morning, you can take in the breathtaking desert dawn views and a sumptuous meal.

The journey begins with an amazing 4X4 dune bash that includes a thrilling ride through the spectacular and impossibly long sand valleys. Then there are a variety of entertaining activities including camel rides, photo ops in traditional Emirati attire, adorable henna tattooing, and Shisha smoking. Until we serve you a delicious BBQ meal with a tempting choice of salads, starters, and desserts, you may relax in our desert tent, which accurately captures the Bedouin atmosphere, or even recharge by the fire.

Contact one of our tour experts for an adventure journey like no other. You may be sure that you’ll enjoy the most unforgettable desert adventure ever.

name: Lego Land Dubai
description: Theme parks and amusement centers are not new to Dubai. But just a small portion of them are geared toward the younger children; the majority serve older children and adults. Legoland Dubai, which is a component of the larger Dubai Parks & Resorts, is geared toward kids between the ages of 2 and 12. Over a 3 million square foot area, there are six amazing interactive zones. Here, you can take advantage of almost 40 fun rides and activities. Additionally, there are lots of eateries and shops around here. Learn more about the zones and lands of this fantastic theme park. Kids can engage team building exercises and have some cool experiences in LEGO City, an amazing location. They can obtain a license to operate a vehicle, a plane, or a boat here. They can also work as police or fire fighters. Imagination: As the name says, using your imagination is the key to surviving in this place. Kids have the opportunity to construct and race Lego automobiles. The world of LEGO MINDSTORMS robots is also accessible to them. In addition to all of this, there are several fantastic attractions including rollercoasters. Prepare yourself for some thrilling adventures in this area. Here, some of the attractions to look forward to include Wave Racers, Kingdom Adventure, Submarine Adventure, etc. You may find Adventure Base Camp and the Discovery Center Aquarium in this area as well. Kingdoms: The young ones at the Kingdoms Land will face some regal difficulties. Your children would be kept on their toes by titles like Merlin’s Challenge and Dragon’s Apprentice. The unique and iconic sites of the UAE may be seen in Miniland, an indoor, air-conditioned land that was constructed using more than 20 million LEGO bricks. Factory Here, you get the opportunity to see how LEGO bricks are actually constructed. A LEGO brick would also be given to you right from the casting line. The biggest LEGO store in the Middle East is located in this country, where you may get your own LEGO kit. Here, you’d also run into some intriguing LEGO characters.

name: Historic Dubai
description: On this tour, which begins in the well-known Jumeirah neighborhood, you can experience Dubai’s historic sites and vibrant cosmopolitan life. Visit the historically accurate Madinat Souk to capture breathtaking images of the iconic Burj Al Arab Hotel, and then drive to the artificial Palm Jumeirah Island to get a closer look at the Atlantis Resort, another iconic building. Disembark at the Spice Souk, where the aromas of the Orient converge, and then spend some time shopping in the Gold Souk, one of Dubai’s most popular attractions. Your journey comes to an end in Downtown Dubai’s brand-new center, where you can admire the magnificent Burj Khalifa, the tallest structure in the world.

name: Dubai Garden Glow
description:
Theme park Dubai Glow Garden at Zabeel Park is the biggest and most distinctive of its type and is unquestionably a work of art! You may view the marvels created from biodegradable materials in its Glow Park, which is a beautifully designed enormous garden with a brand-new theme in every season. So come along with us on a vacation to this amazing location, which not only offers you and your family an exotic family entertainment but also a superb educational experience. Since its singular goal is to reduce carbon footprints and efficiently save the environment, the exhibits on display here light in time with that goal.

Discover the many facets of “Art by Day and Glow by Night” and be mesmerized by the magnificent works produced by the top artists. Yes, the park is home to thousands of magnificent eco-art installations made by more than 500 talented artisans from around the world. Find here a number of themed areas that are illuminated by millions of energy-saving LED lights and packed with interesting replicas of just about anything you can think of, from flowers, trees, and birds to wildlife tunnels for additional cutting-edge experiences, and take in its many must-see sights including the Talking Tree, Happy Forest, Happiness Street, and My Dubai.

In addition to these, make sure to visit its newest additions, including Magic Park, which will astound you with its astounding optical illusions made using exceptional 3D art installations, and Art Park, where you’ll find the majority of the vivacious displays that were imaginatively finished using more than 500,000 recyclable materials. If that isn’t enough, the Glow Park also features hypnotic displays like Colorful World (a light and laser show) and Magical Nights, along with live performances by national, international, and local artists and acrobats.

You can upgrade your Dubai Glow Garden tickets to gain access to the garden’s other main attractions, including the region’s first-ever Dinosaur Park and Ice Park, which recreates an extremely cool Arctic atmosphere using more than 5000 tons of ice. Your ticket currently grants you access to the Glow Park as well as Magic Park and Art Park.

name: Madame Tussauds
description:
Relish the chance to meet your favorite people from practically every field of fame in one place on Bluewaters Island thanks to your Madame Tussauds Dubai tickets. Enjoy the most engaging lifelike wax exhibitions in seven thematic areas that encourage you to luxuriate in the universe of all the stars. Come here in the hopes of enjoying limitless postures and photos with famous icons because there are no ropes or rods to keep you apart from these respected characters.

 

Madame Tussauds consists of a brilliant group of sculptors who meticulously crafted each of the wax figurines on display, giving them an uncanny real-life appearance. The most remarkable aspect is that the museum uses a 200-year-old technique to complete these wax replicas to the highest standard. This shows that Marie Tussauds herself employed the same time-tested but inventive and reliable procedures of the 19th century.

The museum is one of its numerous locations across the world and is situated on Bluewaters Island, one of Dubai’s newest tourist destinations. Madame Tussauds Dubai, located next to the tallest building of its kind in Ain Dubai, has many incredible zones with wax replicas of some of the most well-known actors, athletes, historical figures, and, most significantly, Middle Eastern icons.

 

With its brand new (Compared to the others) facility in Dubai, the Madame Tussauds Museum has made its grand reveal in the Middle East. The great wax sculptor Marie Tussauds founded a museum in London in the 1830s, which is when the Madame Tussauds Museum first opened. Like in its other locations, you may find here life-size wax reproductions of famous people from a variety of fields, like entertainment, history, sports, art, science and politics. The best part is that there are no barriers or restrictions, so you are free to interact with the amazing wax figurines, talk to them, and even take some cool selfies or group photos.

name: La Perle
description:
Dubai is already well-known for its enviable extravaganza of performances, concerts, and theatrical productions. But La Perle by Dragone has something truly ground-breaking in store for you that is the first of its kind in the area. This 90-minute performance, which Franco Dragone, a renowned cultural artistic theater director, conceptualized, is the main event at the impressive Al Habtoor City development on the banks of the Dubai Water Canal.

The show La Perle features amazing water-based acts and stunts. It comes as no surprise that it is not performed on a traditional stage. It takes place in a unique 1,300-seat aqua theater that holds around 2.7 million gallons of water and is located within The Atrium. This has the special ability to change the stage from an aquatic to a dry platform. Its theater-in-the-round seating arrangement makes it simple to find a good spot to watch the performance.

With their captivating acrobatic and aerial feats, expertly planned dance sequences, and stunning costumes, a champion cast of more than 60 world-class performers (from all over the world) will effortlessly engross you in the world of mystery and adventure. The show’s fantastical elements are enhanced by thrilling live music, top-notch special effects, creative use of fountains, and superior hydraulic lifts.

name: Warner Bros Abu Dhabi
description:
Increase the excitement and thrill of your upcoming Dubai trip with this revitalizing tour to Yas Island’s newest and most anticipated attraction, Warner Bros World Abu Dhabi. The 1.65-million-square-foot facility promises a massive amount of amusement and entertainment in its six distinct lands, each with 29 rides dedicated to your favorite characters from Warner Bros franchises.

As you begin your adventure at Warner Bros., you will be transported to the Golden Age of Hollywood. Plaza. This absolutely lives up to your expectations, owing primarily to its imposing All-Star Spectacular show. Then, join your favorite DC superheroes by riding some of Metropolis’ thrilling 4D and 5D rides. And what awaits you on Gotham City’s murkier streets and skies is a chance to catch up with Batman and take on some of the city’s oddest villains. Don’t miss its thrilling coaster rides and experiences, such as the Joker Funhouse, Riddler Revolution, Rogues Gallery Game, and Scarecrow Scare Raid.

 

Cartoon Junction will quickly become your children’s favorite land, as they enjoy the exciting Tom and Jerry: Swiss Cheese Spin, the Scooby-Doo: Museum of Mysteries, and many other attractions based on their favorite cartoon characters. Finally, there’s Dynamite Gulch, an exuberant animated land filled with rides and attractions centered on the ever-popular duo, Wile E Coyote and Road Runner. This is also the perfect spot for those of you who wish to relive your childhood.

name: IMG Worlds of Adventure
description:
You are invited to take part in the amazing adventures at IMG Worlds of Adventure. This theme park in the City of Arabia was created by IMG (Ilyas & Mustafa Galadari) Group and is a part of Dubailand Entertainment. It is the largest indoor theme park in the world, covering around 1.5 million square feet.

Four diverse zones, including Marvel, Lost Valley, Cartoon Network, and IMG Boulevard, are available at this ginormous temperature-controlled entertainment complex. Each zone has its own assortment of standout attractions and culinary establishments. The 350,000-square-foot Marvel Zone is designed to resemble New York’s streets. It offers an exclusive lineup of 3D coasters designed after some of the most recognizable superheroes from Marvel Comics as well as some other huge surprises in store for you.

The 230,000-square-foot Cartoon Network area-, is filled with a variety of kid-friendly spaces, including The Powderpuff Girls’ Mojo Jojo’s Robot Rampage and other fun locations. The main attraction is the first-ever in the world Ben10 5 D Cinema. The largest retail establishment in the world is in this segment; it is also specifically themed after the popular cartoon television series Ben 10.

At Lost Valley, which is an exhilarating, innovative idea that is exclusive to IMG Worlds of Adventure Dubai, things get even more exciting. It has five unique characteristic rides, including Adventure Fortress, Dino Carousel, Forbidden Territory, Predator, and Velociraptor, and boasts 70 animatronic dinosaurs, which is guaranteed to get you excited and your heart pump.

The Haunted Hotel is located on IMG Boulevard, and it’s the perfect place to end the journey. Fortunately, IMG Boulevard offers options for a number of tamer activities as well, in case rides don’t pique your interest or all the action-packed enjoyment gets to you. Its amazing selection of restaurants, bars, and shopping establishments as well as attractions like Adventure Photography are great alternatives.

name: Dolphin Bay
description:
This fantastic tour is your opportunity to get up close and personal with dolphins, one of the planet’s cutest mammals. The largest dolphin habitat in the world is located at Dolphin Bay, which is a part of the magnificent Atlantis, The Palm Resort. It protects a pod of stunning Bottlenose dolphins in their serene habitat with its immaculately kept lagoons.

A trip to Dolphin Bay promises something exciting for all age groups, whether you’re traveling alone, with friends, or with your family and kids. It offers a variety of interactive packages to choose from, each of which is remarkably unique, ranging from the incredibly exciting Dolphin Adventure to the insightful learning programs and incredible private experience.

If you’re an experienced swimmer, sign up for a Royal Swim or Dolphin Adventure to experience the greatest dolphin fun and excitement. This enables you to descend into the lagoon’s depths where you can experience the exhilaration of swimming with dolphins and taking part in various acts, such as belly riding. Certified scuba divers have wonderful options for encounters with dolphins as well.

For all activities except Dolphin Photo Fun, you will be outfitted with wet suits, vests, and towels in addition to a 15-minute orientation by a qualified marine specialist. Not to mention that this is the best dolphin activity and will leave you with lifelong memories.

As an alternative, Dolphin Encounter is great for both swimmers and non-swimmers alike! To meet your dolphin companion, simply wade into the shallow, crystal-clear water. This will allow you to not only admire the beauty and intelligence of these amazing creatures up close, but also to touch, hug, and kiss them. You can now choose Dolphin Photo Fun and return with a free souvenir photo taken with dolphins if you don’t want to get wet at all.

No outside food or drinks are allowed in the park.
At towel retail locations, complementary life jackets are available.

The Dolphin encounters are contingent upon availability, and our team will work with you to arrange for the same.

name: Morning Safari With Sandboarding & Camel Ride
description:
Take a ride outside of the city and into the vast dune fields of the Arabian Desert with this exclusive Sunrise Desert Safari. This gives you the chance to appreciate Dubai’s desert’s beauty from a different angle in the morning light.

A sunrise safari in Dubai is incredible and rejuvenating in every way. It’s the best time to experience the magnificent desert landscape. Beginning with an early-morning pick-up from your Dubai location, you’ll be able to take in the region’s breathtaking contrasts as you depart from the glitzy sights and sounds and travel through the desert’s desolate yet incredibly fascinating region along the empty roads.

Admire the unique and beautiful desert flora and fauna, before you go for a wonderful dune bash across the beautiful dunes of Dubai in a powerful vehicle. With lots of exhilarating turns and nerve-wrecking twists, it rides you through the sheer-low and nerve-wracking high dunes, allowing you to relish the desert in all its beautiful glory.

The authentic Emirati culture and traditions can also be experienced by visiting our campsite with a Bedouin theme. A morning desert safari in Dubai will never fall short of your expectations, whether you’re a nature lover or an adventurer looking to partake in an exhilarating range of desert activities. Thrill seekers can also try heart-pumping activities like sand boarding, quad biking, desert camel rides, etc. with the help of our amazing guide. So book a trip with us and get ready to explore a world filled with breath-taking opportunities.
